name: The Night at Jurgjomkle's
description:
Following the disappearances of several, an investigation team has been assigned to this building, and you're in it. Your job is to make sure nothing breaks in and tampers with the evidence... but you're not alone.

The Night at Jurgjomkle's is a Five Nights at Freddy's fangame. Be warned that it contains loud, sudden sounds and images, as well as flashing lights... sort of.
